lines.text: Well, we've got enough evidence to pinch 'im, ain't we?

When you've learned your business as a detective officer, which will be somewhere around the year 1990, you'll discover that there's always sufficient evidence to pinch people but generally not quite enough evidence to convict them.

[Last lines]
A thousand years of being great. Gone out, like a candle in the wind...
How queer - well, we certainly do see life.
